description.value:
Weapon (Bo-Rifle)

You have a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls with this enhanced weapon. Additionally, while it is in staff mode, the save DC for its shocking property increases to 15.

This version of the bo-rifle was exclusive to high-ranking members of the Honor Guard of Lasan.

Â 

Bo-rifle

Modal (blaster rifle and techstaff)

A weapon with this property can switch between modes. A list of weapons in parentheses appears with the property-the weapons between which an exotic weapon can be switched by using an object interaction.

Weapon (Bo-Rifle)

You have a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls with this enhanced weapon. Additionally, while it is in staff mode, the save DC for its shocking property increases to 15.

This version of the bo-rifle was exclusive to high-ranking members of the Honor Guard of Lasan.

 

Bo-rifle
